#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define mod 1000000007
#define debug(x) cout << "[DEBUG] " << #x << " = " << x << "\n"
int dp[305][100005];
int fact[310];
int main()
{

int t,i,j;
cin>>t;

for(j=1;j<305;j++)
    dp[j][0]=1;

for(i=1;i<100005;i++)
{
    for(j=1;j<305;j++)
    {
        if(i>=j)
        dp[j][i]= (0LL + dp[j-1][i] + dp[j][i-j])%mod;
        else
        {
            dp[j][i] = dp[j-1][i]%mod;
        }
    }
}


fact[1]=1;

for(i=2;i<=305;i++)
{
    fact[i] = (1LL*fact[i-1]*i)%mod;
}


int n,m,uri;
long long ug;

while(t--)
{

cin>>n>>m;

uri = m-(n*(n+1))/2;

if(uri<0)
    cout<<0<<endl;
else{

  ug = (1LL*dp[n][uri]*fact[n])%mod;
  cout<<ug<<endl;
}



}

}
